alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Inland Hillsborough (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 6:29PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Hillsborough County through 700 PM EDT... At 629 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Temple Terrace to near Greater Sun Center. Movement was west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Temple Terrace, Brandon, Fish Hawk, Palm River-Clair Mel, East Lake-Orient Park, Riverview, Lake Magdalene, Ruskin, University, Greater Sun Center, Egypt Lake-Leto, Greater Carrollwood, Busch Gardens, University Of Tampa, Mango, Peter O Knight Airport, Tampa Executive Airport, Boyette and Lettuce Lake Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
